title: Knowledge Hub LLM System
description: Developing a multi-stage AI pipeline for a global research knowledge hub. Implemented synthetic data generation and dummy report creation using the OpenAI API, along with a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system with memory. Currently working toward fine-tuning LLMs on actual research papers and designing multi-agent monitoring with guardrails.

title: Vision Transformer for Image Classification
description: Implemented a Vision Transformer (ViT) from scratch in PyTorch for image classification on CIFAR-10. Focused on understanding patch embeddings, self-attention, and transformer blocks rather than maximizing accuracy, as part of a computer vision course project.
